document_data.name: ''Staff of the World Pillars''
document_data.mainbody: The '''Staff of the World Pillars''' was a powerful magical staff carried by the [[The Faceless God|Forgotten God]].{{Cite dragon/241/Campaign Classics: The Roof of the World}}
document_data.Powers: This staff combined all of the effects of a ''[[ring of regeneration]]'', a ''[[staff of withering]]'', and ''[[chimes of interruption]]''. In the hands of the Forgotten God this staff was powered by the beliefs and sacrifices of the Forgotten God's loyal [[yikarian]] followers, meaning that it could be used without expending a charge like other magical staves. The ''Staff of the World Pillars'' possessed 40 irreplaceable charges in the hands of anyone but the Forgotten God.
